roleset.name: give money to, funding, being a customer of
roleset.note: PATRONIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'patronize' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from patronize.01-v predicate notes)
PATRONAGE-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, WordNet, patronize.01. No VNcls. (from patronage.01-n)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Perhaps , [*-1] considering the value of our time , we-1 will be unable [*-1]to patronize their establishments in the post-Hugo era .

example.name: Both args
example.text: These men of the upper middle class aided the progress oi humanism in various ways ? by their patronage of artists and literary men, for example.
